publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4460 Sandra White: Strength to Strength, Glasgow Credit Union 20 Years On—That the Parliament congratulates Glasgow Credit Union, which celebrates its 20th anniversary on 19 June 2009; notes that since its humble inception back in 1989, the Glasgow Credit Union has grown to become the largest and most successful credit union in the United Kingdom, with a membership of 23,000 and a range of services to rival any bank, including savings, personal loans, mortgages, current accounts, insurance, cash ISAs and Child Trust Funds; believes that Glasgow Credit Union is a perfect example of Scotland’s excellent credit union network, and wishes it every continued success for the next 20 years and beyond. Supported by: Alasdair Allan*, Bill Kidd*, Rob Gibson*, Kenneth Gibson*, Pauline McNeill*, Bill Butler*
S3M-4460 Strength to Strength, Glasgow Credit Union 20 Years On (lodged on 19 June 2009) Jackie Baillie*, Stuart McMillan*, Bob Doris*
S3M-4460 Strength to Strength, Glasgow Credit Union 20 Years On (lodged on 19 June 2009) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-4460 Strength to Strength, Glasgow Credit Union 20 Years On (lodged on 19 June 2009) Karen Whitefield*
S3M-4460 Strength to Strength, Glasgow Credit Union 20 Years On (lodged on 19 June 2009) Gil Paterson*
S3M-4460 Strength to Strength, Glasgow Credit Union 20 Years On (lodged on 19 June 2009) Ken Macintosh*
